name: Rest

values.name: filter
values.type: List (a -> Rest.Filter) -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Rest.RestRequest a

values.name: limit
values.type: List ( Rest.Resource a, Int ) -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Rest.RestRequest a

values.name: nested
values.type: Rest.Resource a -> List (a -> Rest.Property) -> b -> Rest.Property

values.name: not'
values.type: (a -> (b -> Rest.Property) -> b -> Rest.Filter) -> a -> (b -> Rest.Property) -> b -> Rest.Filter

values.name: order
values.type: List (a -> Rest.OrderBy) -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Rest.RestRequest a

values.name: paginate
values.type: Int -> Int -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Rest.RestRequest a

values.name: select
values.type: List (a -> Rest.Property) -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Rest.RestRequest a

values.name: send
values.type: (Rest.RestRequest a -> Http.Request) -> Http.Settings -> Rest.RestRequest a -> Task.Task Http.RawError Http.Response

name: Rest.Types

types.name: RestRequest
cases: { properties : List Rest.Types.Property , filters : List Rest.Types.Filter , orders : List Rest.Types.OrderBy , limits : List ( Rest.Types.Resource schema, Int ) , offset : Int , singular : Bool , suppressCount : Bool , verb : String , resource : Rest.Types.Resource schema , url : String }

values.name: unwrapResource
values.comment: helper to assist with opaque Resource type

values.name: unwrapRestRequest
values.comment: helper to assist with opaque RestRequest type
values.type: Rest.Types.RestRequest a -> { properties : List Rest.Types.Property , filters : List Rest.Types.Filter , orders : List Rest.Types.OrderBy , limits : List ( Rest.Types.Resource a, Int ) , offset : Int , singular : Bool , suppressCount : Bool , verb : String , resource : Rest.Types.Resource a , url : String }
